name: Spaceship Minigolf
description:
This is a first shot at a Spaceship Minigolf game.

Put the ball in the hole, controlling only the artificial gravity activation.

  • On computer:
    • Down Arrow: Activate Gravity
    • Space: Unactivate Gravity
  • On mobile:
    • Swipe Down: Activate Gravity
    • Tap: Unactivate Gravity

Please throw feedback at me, I will improve it based on that.
